summary.title: Professional Summary
summary.content:
Male, 22 years old, born on April 8, 2002. Based in Aktobe, Kazakhstan. Open to relocation to Almaty or Astana and business trips.

Experienced Full Stack Developer with a focus on backend development, but also hands-on frontend skills. Interested in AI, microservices, and DevOps.

jobs.title: Programmer-Developer
responsibilities: Developing new products from scratch and supporting existing ones.
Debugging and fixing production and test environment issues.
Working with Yii2 (PHP), PostgreSQL, Redis for API and business logic.
Implemented Redis caching for student transcript exports, significantly reducing DB load and speeding up data rendering.
Used Redis key dependencies tied to student_id to update only changed records.
Created and maintained DB migrations in Yii2/PostgreSQL.
Implemented a "Resit Journal" module for students retaking exams; collaborated with a ReactJS frontend developer.
Fixed bugs and made minor frontend updates on ReactJS when needed.

AI-Pitchmaker (slides.citorleu.kz):
  • Set up a FastAPI backend with Python, SQLAlchemy, Pydantic, Alembic.
  • Integrated JWT authorization for seamless user logins across multiple services.
  • Introduced Celery + Redis for asynchronous task processing (e.g., generating AI-based presentations) and offloading the main thread.
  • Built a ReactJS + Redux Toolkit frontend and an admin panel using SQLAdmin.
  • Occasionally performed DevOps tasks (cron jobs via crontab on the server, log monitoring, restarts) together with the main DevOps specialist.
  • In-code scheduling via AsyncIOScheduler for daily subscription updates.

jobs.title: Backend Developer
responsibilities: Administration of MySQL databases
Technical support from 9:00 to 18:00
Code refactoring
Following coding patterns and principles: MVC, DRY, SOLID
Bug diagnostics and fixing
Establishing workflows and communicating with taxi fleet managers in case of system failures or errors

jobs.title: Lead Developer
responsibilities: Maintained a WordPress website and a Telegram bot written in Node.js.
Handled layout, server administration, DevOps tasks, data parsing, and SEO optimization.

jobs.title: Full Stack Developer
responsibilities: Built features with Laravel (PHP 8) for avtomarket.group.
Deployed VPS (Ubuntu 22.04) with HestiaCP, worked on Figma layouts, HTML, SCSS, WebPack, JS landings.
Created APIs, worked with legacy code, used Docker Compose for containerization.
Introduced testing on Appium + Flutter + Python and documented API requests in Postman.

Key projects:
  • visite.kz – Flutter + pure PHP + MySQL (support & bug fixes).
  • avtomarket.group – Laravel + MySQL + Docker (added custom functionalities).
  • uplawyers.kz – Layout with WebPack + SCSS.

jobs.title: Web Developer
responsibilities: Optimized and set up caching.
Supported a WordPress-based online store.
Performed data parsing in Python and handled data uploads.

jobs.title: Technical Support Specialist
responsibilities: Installed and configured Umag software.
Set up 1C-based cash registers.
Trained users and provided technical support.

jobs.title: Individual Entrepreneur
responsibilities: Interacted with clients, performed layouts, and created APIs.
Developed web applications and explored new technologies.
Used Django REST, ReactJS, Linux, Gunicorn, Redux.
Collaborated with designers for UI/UX ideas.

education.title: Education
education.content:
Aktobe Higher Polytechnic College · 2021

Information Technology, Web Developer

projects.title: Kostanay MIA Academy Site
projects.description: A project for the Kostanay MIA Academy, including new modules and enhancements to the admin panel using Yii2 and PostgreSQL.

projects.title: Karaganda MIA Academy Site
projects.description: Project for the Karaganda MIA Academy, including API and GraphQL support for the academy's information system.

projects.title: Slides.citorleu.kz
projects.description: Developed from scratch for generating AI-based presentations using ChatGPT, integrated with Stable Diffusion and Google Image Search.

projects.title: Presentation Editor (In Development)
projects.description: A web application for creating and editing presentations, built with React and Redux Toolkit. Focuses on flexibility of the user interface.

projects.title: E-commerce on Golang (In Development)
projects.description: A platform for e-commerce with a Go-based backend, using GORM for database management and Docker for environment setup.

projects.title: Business Card Website for Lawyers
projects.description: A minimalist business card site with a responsive design aimed at presenting legal services. Uses modern technologies for optimal loading and display.
